BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Department of Education to convene a task force to review the outreach practices and graduate outcomes at institutions with gainful employment programs in New York State.
